RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 75. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 17700. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $8,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $15,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since J une 14, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $10,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISS MOON PIE set the pace early, was off the rail into the lane, repelled foe down the lane and kicked clear in the final stages. APRIL'S NO FOOL stalked the pace early, made a bid nearing the lane, was in the three path into the lane and no match for the winner in the stretch run. PRINCESSTAPITURE tracked the pace early, made a bid three wide nearing the lane, was in the four path into the lane and weakened late in the stretch drive. SILKY WARRIOR (IRE) stumbled at the start and trailed the field early on, raced in the three path into the lane and moved up. SACRED BEAUTY was through after a half. L. A. STAR broke out at the start and was done early.

ENTRY.NAME: Princesstapiture
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace early, bid 3wd 1/4, 4p into lane, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Moon Pie
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace early, off rail into lane, repelled foe, kicked clear

ENTRY.NAME: April's No Fool
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace early, bid 1/4, 3p into lane, no match for winner

ENTRY.NAME: Sacred Beauty
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half

ENTRY.NAME: Silky Warrior (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled start, trailed early, 3p into lane, moved up

ENTRY.NAME: L. A. Star
ENTRY.OWNER: Lucas Ted W and Givens Charles
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out start, done early

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 17800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since June 14 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed4 lbs. C laiming Price $16,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UPGRADE AL set the pace from the outset and remained unchallenged down the lane under a steady drive throughout. THE PINK Z broke out at the start, chased the pace early and was no match for the winner in the stretch run. JUST TAPIT IN broke out and hit the gate at the start, outrun. IT'SGOODTOBESEEN was bumped at the start, chased the leader for a half then folded up.

ENTRY.NAME: The Pink Z
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out start, chased pace, no match for winner

ENTRY.NAME: It'sgoodtobeseen
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, chased for half, folded up

ENTRY.NAME: Upgrade Al
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace early, unchallenged, driving

ENTRY.NAME: Just Tapit In
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, hit gate start

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 5F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 9100. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since June 14, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NARA pressed the pace early two wide, was in the four path into the lane, took over command and kicked clear late. KOBE BEACH chased the pace early, was in the six path into the lane, rallied down the lane with a mild gain late in the stretch run. GOLDEN SURVIVOR chased the pace early, was in the four path into the lane, made a bid in the stretch but flattened out late in the drive. EASILY INFLUENCED set the pace early, was off the rail into the lane and faltered late in the stretch drive. KING T'CHALLA tracked the pace early, was in the five path into the lane and weakened late in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Easily Influenced
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace early, off rail into lane, faltered stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Nara
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2wd, 4p into lane, took over, kicked clear late

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Peter A. Berglar Racing Interests, LLC& Anderson Farms (On

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Survivor
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace early, 4p into lane, bid str, flattened out late

ENTRY.NAME: King T'challa
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace early, 5path into lane, weakened late stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Kobe Beach
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace early, 6path into lane, rallied stretch, mild gain

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 16100. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE JULY 14, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SARAH JANE trailed the field early on, rallied up the inside into the lane, took over command and drew away late in the stretch under a brisk drive. SHEZA FINE JUSTICE stalked the pace early, was shuffled back nearing the lane, raced in the four path and came again for place in the late stages. BEEBLEGEE chased the pace early, made a bid nearing the lane, was in the five path into the lane but weakened late and settled for show spot in the final stages. MISS TREATED STAR was away alertly from the gate and set the pace from the outset, raced in the five path while drifting out entering the lane and gave way down the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Sarah Jane
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed early on, rallied up ins into lane, drew away late str

ENTRY.NAME: Sheza Fine Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace early, shuffled, 4p into lane, came again for 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Beeblegee
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace early, bid 1/4, 5p into lane, weakened to lose 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Treated Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, drifted out into lane, gave way stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 1M Turf CR: 81. Allowance Purse 17800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 14 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)( Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $15,000). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.) (Rail at 14 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FAST FALL set the pace early, was off the rail into the lane, repelled foe down the lane and cleared in the final stages. P K WOOD raced in the three path into the first turn, chased the early pace, was on the inside into the lane, made a bid from the rail down the lane, altered out near the sixteenth pole and hung in the late stages. CROONER stalked the pace early, was in the three path into the lane while making a bid but weakened late in the stretch run. DESERT HIGHWAY trailed the field early on, was on the inside into the lane and moved up in the stretch drive. SILVESTRE raced in the five path into the first turn, was in the six path into the lane and never a threat. COLOR FIELD chased the pace early, was in the four path into the lane and faded late in the stretch. ALL ABOUT CROGE tracked the pace early, was on the inside into the lane and empty down the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Fast Fall
ENTRY.OWNER: Megson Berva Silver Lining Racing LLC Tennant Angela Tennant Kurt and 4C Sons LL
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace early, off rail into lane, repelled foe, cleared late

ENTRY.NAME: Desert Highway
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed early on, inside into lane, moved up stretch

ENTRY.NAME: All About Croge
ENTRY.OWNER: Megson Berva and Hooves and Saddles LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace early, inside into lane, empty late stretch

ENTRY.NAME: P K Wood
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3p into 1st, chased, ins into lane, bid rail, altered out, hung

ENTRY.NAME: Color Field
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace early, 4path into lane, faded stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Silvestre
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5p into 1st turn, 6p into lane, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Crooner
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace early, 3path into lane, bid, weakened late stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 97. Starter Allowance Purse 14400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since June 14, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then Allowe d 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: POPULIST set the pace early, was off the rail into the lane, headed near the eighth pole but fought back and edged clear in the final stages. RAISON KARTER chased the pace early, was on the inside into the lane, dueled down the stretch, headed foe near the eighth pole but was outfinished in the final stages. KNIGHT'S CROSS raced five wide into the first turn, stalked the early pace, was off the rail into the lane and weakened late in the stretch run. SUBDUED was rushed up into the first turn while three wide, vied early, raced in the four path into the lane and was empty late in the stretch. DROPPED ANCHOR was between horses into the first turn, pressed the pace early two wide, was in the four path into the lane and faded down the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Populist
ENTRY.OWNER: H and W Stables LLC and Odom Chris
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace early, off rail into lane, headed 1/8, came back, clrd

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Dr. Aaron Sones, Lester Kwok & Dr.Naoya Yoshida

ENTRY.NAME: Dropped Anchor
ENTRY.COMMENT: btw 1st, pressed 2wd, 4path into lane, faded late stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Subdued
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3wd into 1st, rushed, 4p into lane, empty stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Raison Karter
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, ins into lane, dueled str, headed foe, outfinished late

ENTRY.NAME: Knight's Cross
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5wd into 1st, stalked pace, off rail into lane, weakened late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 1M Turf CR: 63. Maiden Claiming Purse 13000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $7,500). (If transferred to t he Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHE'S A KEEPER set the pace early, was off the rail into the lane, widened down the lane and was geared down in the final stages. JOEZINE raced back early on, was in the five path into the lane and moved up in the stretch run. GAMBI chased the pace early, was in the three path into the lane with a minor gain late in the stretch drive. MACI'S GEMSTONE trailed the field early on, was in the three path into the lane with a mild gain in the stretch run. AWESOME VALOR stalked the pace early, was off the rail into the lane and weakened late in the stretch drive. LADY BIRD KISSES was through after three quarters.

ENTRY.NAME: Maci's Gemstone
ENTRY.OWNER: Short Tommy C and Heyer Robert
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed early on, 3path into lane, mild gain stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Gambi
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace early, 3path into lane, minor gain late stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Bird Kisses
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after 3/4

ENTRY.NAME: She's a Keeper
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace early, off rail into lane, widened str, geared down late

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Valor
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace early, off rail into lane, weakened late stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Joezine
ENTRY.COMMENT: back early on, 5path into lane, moved up stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 62. Maiden Claiming Purse 9100. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUPREME SONG dueled early on from the inside, took over command near the five sixteenths pole, was off the rail into the lane and drew off late in the stretch under a steady drive. SCOTCH NO ROCKS dueled early on two wide, was in the three path into the lane and no match for the winner in the stretch run. GOOD SOUL chased the pace early, was on the inside into the lane and weakened late in the stretch drive. EL MIC TIESUN chased the pace early, was in the three path into the lane and moved up. GRASSROOTS was through after a half. BENITO trailed the field throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Grassroots
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half

ENTRY.NAME: Supreme Song
ENTRY.OWNER: Mackey, Wayne L. and Birsh, Philip
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early ins, took over 5/16, off rail into lane, drew off

ENTRY.NAME: Good Soul

ENTRY.NAME: Benito
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Scotch No Rocks
ENTRY.OWNER: Cox John L Williams James M and Roberson Denis W
